title: Falco00
author: Falco00
content: I’m looking for a small loan. This is my first request.Loan Amount: 300 UsdtLoan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 330 UsdtLoan Repay Date: after one monthType of Collateral: NoneTRC20 - USDT address: TYnQNYkAgneiC1e3PMD2kPcg9qQEvPDFP8

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Falco00 on October 21, 2022, 02:51:03 PMI’m looking for a small loan. This is my first request.Loan Amount: 300 UsdtLoan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 330 UsdtLoan Repay Date: after one monthType of Collateral: NoneTRC20 - USDT address: TYnQNYkAgneiC1e3PMD2kPcg9qQEvPDFP8You've made 15 posts in the last 9 years, 7 in the last two years.  Despite your air-dropped merit making you a senior member, you are essentially a newbie asking for a no collateral loan.  I seriously doubt anyone is going to take this risk.I suggest you offer collateral or lock this thread.

comments.author: Falco00
comments.body: I don't think I have ever scammed anyone, bitbollo only expressed his opinion for a service I advertised and I did it only to advertise reflink.Regarding stratchbitcoin, I never stole anything from anyone, it was a project I ran and then discontinued. Because it was just accusations from users that I was trying to steal, and that the algorithm was not secure. If you go and read all the discussions, I've always replied to everyone, but unfortunately I understand that with cryptos the smart ones have multiplied and it's full of people who hope for nothing more than to steal from their neighbour. I can assure you that I have never done that. I also wanted to say that in this forum if you try to do something that a senior user doesn't like you are always branded as a scammer. Anyway I've sorted it out I don't need any more, thanks anyway. I see that even though you are not a saint, you have had users give you negative trusts: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=131361

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: Falco00 on October 22, 2022, 07:58:31 AMI see that even though you are not a saint, you have had users give you negative trusts: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=131361If you want to rely on those "trust" feedbacks, then go right ahead.I'm guessing you won't be getting a no collateral loan any time soon.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.created_time: October 22, 2022, 09:56:52 AMLast edit: October 22, 2022, 11:43:25 AM by bitbollo
comments.body: This user Falco00 Is actually supporting a scam Ponzi scheme in Italian board. Just check reference on negative trust I have left. Its clearly impossible an investment with a ROI of 290% and more. Its not an opinion  , its a Ponzi there Is nothing to talk about... If you are ready to get involved other users Just to "earn" few bucks you dont deserve any kind of trust. He also refuse to edit his posts and reply to my observations.After he has been tagged he Is trying to get this loan but since there Is no collateral its clear he Is just running out from the forum (otherwise another negative trust for a loan default will have any value at this point? Of course no).

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: Falco00 on November 02, 2022, 04:19:43 PMTo the phenomenon bitbollo I just did a search on the website of the Italian Revenue Agency this is the resultPARTITA IVA ATTIVAComplete with company nameFor anyone who wants to check this is the VAT number: 12472880967this is the URL to the "Agenzia delle Entrate" website: https://telematici.agenziaentrate.gov.it/VerificaPIVA/Scegli.do?parameter=verificaPivawait. phenomenon is only one and is called Ronaldo Luís Nazário de Lima.Moreover, you're completely off topic (this is my last reply on this thread&argument) + you are shilling a stupid ponzi scheme that claim to made at least a 290% in one year. this is the right section for this kind of initiatives:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=83.0 open here a topic.In the same address provided for VAT... there is this Code:https://www.autoriparazionimirenda.it/ last but not least, having a "partita iva" (a limited one  they have just 1000 eur as capital (!!!) ) doesn't mean nothing (it's open since 4 months  )If this wasn't enough they're not able to spell correctly 2 words on their name  QuoteTAMR AI TECHNOLOGY SOCIATA' A RESPONSABILITA' LIMITATA SEMPLIFICA TAif people didn't lose money on something like that.... at least it would be fun!
